name: T9
description:
Death isn't always the end...

W/A/S/D or Up/Down/Left/Right to move, E to Interact, and Z to open Keys Menu.

Here is my submission to the Nokia Game Jam 2 2020. The theme was Death Is Good. Make sure to click the game with your mouse before starting, or the audio will not play right. Make sure to search every nook and cranny! Thank You and I hope you enjoy!
